alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 04 at 4:31PM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and sleet. Additional snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 2 inches for a storm total of 10 to 16 inches and sleet accumulations of between one and two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Central Washington, Interior Hancock and Southern Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow and sleet means severe winter weather conditions will make travel extremely dangerous. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
